member.name: M:Orleans.Storage.AdoNetGrainStorage.CheckVersionInconsistency(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks for version inconsistency as defined in the database scripts.
member.param: Service Id.
The name of this storage provider.
The operation attempted.
The version from storage.
The grain version.
Grain type without generics information.
The grain ID.
member.returns: An exception for throwing or null if no violation was detected.
member.remarks: This means that the version was not updated in the database or the version storage version was something else than null when the grain version was null, meaning effectively a double activation and save.

member.returns: The grain ID as a string.
member.remarks: This likely should exist in Orleans core in more optimized form.

member.returns: The extracted base class or the one given as a parameter if it didn't have a generic part.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AdoNet.Storage.DbExtensions.GetValueOrDefault``1(System.Data.IDataRecord,System.String,``0)
member.summary: Returns a value if it is not , default(TValue) otherwise.
member.typeparam: The type of the value to request.
member.param: The record from which to retrieve the value.
The name of the field to retrieve.
The default value if value in position is .
member.returns: Either the given value or the default for the requested type.
member.remarks: This function throws if the given does not exist.

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AdoNet.Storage.DbExtensions.GetDateTimeValueOrDefault(System.Data.IDataRecord,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Returns a value if it is not , default otherwise.
member.param: The record from which to retrieve the value.
The name of the field to retrieve.
The default value if value in position is .
member.returns: Either the given value or the default for ?.
member.remarks: An explicit function like this is needed in cases where to connector infers a type that is undesirable. An example here is Npgsql.NodaTime, which makes Npgsql return Noda type and consequently Orleans is not able to use it since it expects .NET . This function throws if the given does not exist.

member.name: T:Orleans.Persistence.AdoNet.Storage.IRelationalStorage
member.summary: A common interface for all relational databases.
Executes a given statement. Especially intended to use with SELECT statement.
member.param: The query to execute.
Adds parameters to the query. The parameters must be in the same order with same names as defined in the query.
This function transforms the raw results to type the parameter being the resultset number.
The command behavior that should be used. Defaults to .
The cancellation token. Defaults to .
member.returns: A list of objects as a result of the .

member.name: M:Orleans.Persistence.AdoNet.Storage.IRelationalStorage.ExecuteAsync(System.String,System.Action{System.Data.IDbCommand},System.Data.CommandBehavior,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes a given statement. Especially intended to use with INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE or DDL queries.
member.param: The query to execute.
Adds parameters to the query. Parameter names must match those defined in the query.
The command behavior that should be used. Defaults to .
The cancellation token. Defaults to .
member.returns: Affected rows count.

member.summary: The internal byte array buffer size used in .CopyToAsync. This size is just a guess and is likely dependent on the database tuning settings (e.g. read_buffer_size in case of MySQL).
